Ben jij een Verpleegkundige en ligt jouw hart in de zorg Ben je op zoek naar een baan waarin jij jezelf zowel professioneel als op persoonlijk vlak kunt ontwikkelen Wil je ervaring op doen bij verschillende zorglocaties, maar wel de zekerheid van een contract Maak vandaag nog kennis met Aethon, HOE JOUW DAG ERUIT ZIET, Als Verpleegkundige ben je samen met de medewerkers in je team verantwoordelijk voor de kwaliteit van de zorg, het woon en leefklimaat en het welzijn van de clinten Je voert verzorgende handelingen uit, signaleert mogelijke gezondheidsproblemen bij clinten en helpt met de ADLzorg Je hebt geregeld te maken met comorbiditeit, waardoor je mee moet kunnen veren met de clint Probleemgedrag leer je herkennen en kan hierop inspelen, kortom je bent meer dan een verpleegkundige, WAAR JIJ AAN DE SLAG GAAT, Je krijgt de kans als zorgprofessional om binnen verschillende keukens te kijken om ervaring op te doen of juist een team te komen versterken met je kennis en kunde We hebben in Amsterdam onder andere mogelijkheden binnen de somatiek, revalidatie, jonge dementerende, Nietaangeboren Hersenletsel Eerstelijnsverblijf, psychogeriatrische zorg en thuiszorg Jij bepaalt wat het beste bij jou past en waarvan jij gelukkig wordt Er wordt gekeken naar jouw ontwikkeling en deze wordt gestimuleerd door onze persoonlijke benadering Jij maakt cht het verschil

Job Title: ICRC Weapon Contamination Medical Trainer - Global Deployment
Company Name: International Committee of the Red Cross
Job Description: What we do, , The International Committee of the Red Cross ICRC is an independent and neutral organization that works worldwide to provide humanitarian assistance to people affected by conflict and armed violence When working in situations of armed conflict and immediately postconflict, the ICRC regularly faced with challenges related to weapon contamination, , In addition to the conventional effect due to explosion, we are also launching an operational response capacity for Chemical, Biological, Radiological and Nuclear CBRN events The purpose of the CBRN Operational Response project is to enable the ICRC to respond to CBRN events in a systematic manner, , Medical expertise is critical for managing risks associated with the effect of explosion and CBRN events to ensure the health, safety and security of ICRC staff while maintaining operational continuity and assisting the victims to the extent possible Do you want to join us and put in practice your expertise to help us make a change, , Depending on the context, you would have the following responsibilities, , , , You have a specialized degree in AnesthesiaResuscitation or shown experience as an ER doctor involved in CareTreatment of victims from explosion and in CBRN incidents You also possess a training degree, including instructor certification from a recognized health civilian or military institution Familiarity with curriculum design and development is highly recommended as well as confirmed operational experience in the subject area Experience as a trainer or lecturer within Blast trauma care and effect, and the CBRN field, including the motivation to engage in capacity building overseas in unstable security and low resource settings, is required, , Your Profile, , , , What we offer

Vind jij het leuk om naast jouw taken als Wijkverpleegkundige, 8 uur per week aan het werk te zijn binnen een dokterspost Is een functie met veel vrijheid voor jou belangrijk Lees dan snel verder want dit is de baan voor jou, Jij hebt al wat ervaring opgedaan als Verpleegkundige en zou het leuk vinden om een volgende stap te maken als Wijkverpleegkundige in de thuiszorg In deze functie ben jij, naast het verlenen van de juiste zorg, verantwoordelijk voor het cordineren van de zorg, het indiceren en het bijsturen van je team Je neemt zelf de regie in het indiceren en het maken van zorgplannen voor clinten Dit betekent ook dat sommige clinten van jullie gaan leren om bepaalde dingen weer zelf te doen en dan wordt de zorg afgebouwd Dit is niet voor iedereen makkelijk, dus aan jou de taak om dit goed te laten verlopen Daarnaast besteed je 8 uur per week op de plaatselijke dokterspost, je bent hierin de verbindende factor tussen de de organisatie, de clinten en de huisarts Je hebt een adviserende rol en overlegt met de huisarts welke acties per clint moeten worden ondernomen Deze mensen ontvang je ook op je spreekuur zodat er samen gekeken kan worden welke zorg voor hen nodig is, Jouw nieuwe team is grotendeels zelfsturend Veel van je collegas werken parttime Wil n van jullie vrij Dan regelen jullie dat onderling Vindt jij dat jullie een bepaald hulpmiddel echt zouden moeten hebben Dan bestellen jullie dat zelf Je manager geeft je veel vrijheid en staat open voor jouw ideen Jullie staan uiteindelijk in de wijk en ze hoort graag waar ze bij kan helpen

Our Client is a NHS Trust in Somerset UKThe ward in Somerset is an excellent place to start or continue your inpatient nursing career Whether youre a newly qualified nurse, experienced or a General or Learning Disability Nurse looking for a change, we are excited to hear from you It consists of two fifteen bedded wards which provide an environment that is modern, bright, clean, and safe for individuals admitted to our service We are based alongside a Psychiatric Intensive Care Unit and an ECT Suite so opportunities to access experience in these areas can be easily accommodated We also feel privileged to hold a contract for serving members of the Military, enabling the ward to work closely with the medical bases within the UK and further afield We are able to offer you a supportive and welcoming environment with access to supervision, appraisals, psychology services such as weekly reflective practice groups, and regular opportunities for both formal and informal training There is a strong focus on staff wellbeing on the ward so you can be confident that you will have the support you need to continue to provide good clinical care There is clear clinical leadership within the wards with access to Band 6 Clinical Leads offering a supportive working environment, as well as a structure that provides future opportunities for career development This is a really good opportunity to work in an environment that is challenging but rewarding within a friendly and supportive team Were always happy to hear from potential staff so if youd like to visit us informally to meet the team before applying please feel free to get in touch For those looking to escape busy city life and move to an area that is less populated with more access to open spaces, Somerset has a lot to offer you We are able to offer a relocation package Unpinned Registered Nurse, Band 4, minimum 375 paid hours per week at 24,157 per annum Unsocial hours all time Saturday midnight to midnight and any weekday after 8pm and before 6am basic plus 30 All time on Sunday and Public Holidays midnight to midnight basic plus 60 Pinned Registered Nurse, band 5, minimum 375 paid hours per week at 24,907 per annum Unsocial hours all time Saturday midnightmidnight and any weekday after 8pm and before 6am basic plus 30 All time on Sunday and Public Holidays midnight to midnight basic plus 60 Holidays 27 paid days per annum plus 8 public days 35 paid days Rising to 29 days per annum plus 8 public holidays after 5 years of service and 33 days per annum plus 8 public holidays after 10 years of service Conditions Shift work, Weekly Hours, Shift Pattern Shifts will be as per rotaAccommodation Provided  Cost after paid period 8 weeks free accommodation on siteSingle occupancyInduction and training details Training, travel, accommodation and exam fees all coveredCan candidates start prepinned YesSalary until Pinned 24,157 per annumMeet and Great for candidates on arrival at UK AirportTrust will pay for visa and NHS health surchargeTrust will pay for refund of IELTSOET exam costTrust will pay for CBTTrust will pay for OSCE trainingexam fee and travel costs and partial resit if requiredTrust will pay for NMC application feeTrust will pay for Admission to NMC feeTrust will pay for flight to UK and onward travel to Trust standard economy flightTrust to provide pastoral support in collecting visa, opening a bank account and provide details of local estate agents to find accommodationTrust to provide details of cycle to work schemeTrust to provide basic smart phone with pay as you go sim with credit attachedTrust to provide 6 weeks of paid transport from accommodation to work siteTrust to provide shopping for first 14 days of quarantine up to a value of 60 per week per personMinimum Experience Required Must have NMC recognised degree and IETLSOET Please apply for this job

Functieomschrijving, Ben jij op zoek naar een tijdelijke parttime baan en zou je graag in het grootste ziekenhuis van Utrecht willen werken Wij zijn op zoek naar een administratief medewerker die per direct kan starten en die voor ca 2 tot 3 maanden beschikbaar is voor 2 tot 3 dagen per week, , Deze functie is op het secretariaat van de decaan die zich bezig houdt met het totale proces rondom het verkrijgen van een doctor titel promotie traject Deze wordt hier bewaakt en gecontroleerd, , Het secretariaat is de vraagbaak voor de betrokkenen uit de divisies hoogleraren en secretariaten, De taken zijn aannemen van telefoon, uitzoeken en beantwoorden van mailberichten en het vastleggen van gegevens in het promovendi volgsysteem MyPhD, Functieeisen, , Aanbod, Een uitdagende tijdelijke functie die goed past bij een kandidaat die tussen twee banen zit Deze functie sluit ook mooi aan bij een HBOWO student die het met een studie kan combineren, , Salaris conform de cao van het UMC schaal 3 of 4, Reiskosten 5 cent per km, , Pas op bij het UMC zijn er hoge parkeerkosten die wij helaas niet kunnen vergoeden, , Heb je interesse in deze functie solliciteer dan direct via onze website Heb je vragen dan kun je contact opnemen met onze medewerker Ingrid Drouen click apply click apply, Sollicitatieprocedure, , Ons referentienummer click apply

Job Title: ICU Registered Nurse (ICU RN) - Curacao - Apeldoorn
Job Description: About AMI Curacao, , Curacao, located in the southern Caribbean Sea and part of the Dutch Caribbean region, has a population of approximately 164,000 AMI serve the people of Curacao by providing a high quality of healthcare to combat Covid19, , This is what AMI do, when there is a medical need we provide the facilities, personnel, and equipment to combat the need whatever and wherever it may be, as we are already there, , , , You will work alongside the existing medical teams in a shift pattern of approximately 5 shifts per week each shift lasting 8 hours As an ICU RN you will be relied upon to provide a high level of medical care to the patients,, , There may also be times when you are required to utilize your expertise outside of the intensive care unit For example, ICU RNs may have to assist in medical surgical wards during busy periods, , You will also have the opportunity to gain different experiences and to learn different approaches whilst integrating with the team, a flexible approach is required where necessary when working with a different medical system to what you may be used to, , , , ICU RNs must have a minimum of 3 years of experience of extensive ICUcritical care experience, , You will also be required to have the following qualifications and experiences, , , , , , If youre interested in this role, click apply now to forward an uptodate copy of your CV, , If this job isnt quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career, , Powered by JazzHR

Job Title: MSF-OCBA is looking for an Integration of Chronic Diseases Officer (temporary contract based in any MSF-OCBA hub)
Job Description: GENERAL CONTEXT, , While our most common focus in primary health care has been acute care and preventive activities, chronic diseases represent a significant and growing burden in many of our projects The classical model of care provided in many of our supported structures is mostly designed for the former, at times with some vertical program on a diseasebased approach to specific chronic conditions, , Over the last decades global epidemiology has changed, and chronic conditions both transmissible and not have become a main cause of death, responsible for more than 70 of global mortality Global health trends suggest that in a few years the role of chronic diseases will continue to increase, , In this changed global epidemiology, it is important to reflect upon the classic package of basic health care activities provided by MSF Despite the growing burden of chronic diseases in most of MSFs missions, and the declared priority of a holistic approach, MSF still struggles to integrate chronic disease care in most of the projects, , GENERAL OBJECTIVE AND JOB ENVIROMENT, , The position will be under direct hierarchical supervision of the leader of CDU working group currently HIV, TB and Hep BC Advisor, , The work will be supported by the CD working group in OCBA HIVTB, NCDs, Paediatrics, Mental Health, SRH, Infection Prevention Control and Nurse Referents Other referents will also be integrated along with the progression of the dossier Health Promotion, Decentralised Models of Care, Nutrition, every referent in the medical department involved somehow with the CD working group will provide himher with the critical technical support for the adequate development of the tasks, , Cell 2 TESACO, Medco Nigeria and Pulka project medical team are expected to be consulted for work related aspects, , , , Besides the broad public health perspective, integrated models have the potential of providing several direct benefits to our programs and the beneficiary populations, , Integrated models of care eg HIVTB, noncommunicable disease NCD and mental health MH have been proposed by several actors from a public health perspective The main theoretical aim advocated has been to capitalize resources from the deployment of HIV care in African settings and use it to develop successful approaches for other chronic disease, in particular NCDs Approaches to the development of integrated models have included as well the simultaneous creation of NCDHIV programs, the inclusion of an HIV component in existing NCD programs and the integration of MH in existing NCD or HIVTB programs, , , When the treatment of each chronic disease is done separately it has been associated with health complications such as complex medication regimens with high risk of drug interactions and poor medication adherence, duplicative medical tests, unnecessary hospitalizations, and increased mortality Hence, there is a need for collaborative carevi, , , OBJECTIVES OF THE CHRONIC DISEASE INTEGRATION DOSSIER, , , The technical referents in the medical department involving those areas developed a concept note and started support to Cell 2 and Nigeria mission in order to guide the setup of the CDU in Pulka However different reasons have delayed the development of a package of resources to help full implementation, monitoring and evaluation of the integration of the CDU, , In order to move forward with the CDU, as part of the medical department priorities of integrating care and people centre approach, a request for the allocation of resources to this dossier was validated, , MAIN RESPONSABILITIES, , The main expected result will be the production of the following deliverables, as practical tools for the CDG implementation, , Simplified reporting tools, , , Flow of patients, , Files for patients, , , Training materials, , SELECTION CRITERIA, , , Medical Doctor experience with chronic diseases is desirable, , Field Experience in MSF 1 year or more, , , Desired experience in HIVTBViral Hepatitis, NCD, Paediatric, andor MHPS Programs, , Language English French, Arabic or Spanish are an asset, , Competencies, , , Conditions, , , , MSF OCBA is a peoplefocused humanitarian organization that offers a diverse, collaborative, and inclusive work environment We believe this approach enhances our work and we are committed to equity in employment We embrace diverse backgrounds of people working together to exhibit their passion in action for the social mission of MSF, , Mdecins Sans Frontieres, as a responsible employer, under article 38 of Ley de Integracin Social del Minusvlido de 1982 LISMI invite those persons with a recognized disability and with an interest in the humanitarian area to apply for the abovementioned position, , i Dahal P, Balamurugan G, Basavaraja AU 2017 Prevalence and Predictors of Depression among Diabetes Mellitus in Adult Population J Psychiatry 20 430 , , ii Hughes et al Prevalence of HIV, hepatitis B, and hepatitis C in people with severe mental illness a systematic review and metaanalysis Lancet Psychiatry 20163 4048, , iii Liu S, Wu R, Li L, Liu L, Li G, et al 2014 The Prevalence of Anxiety and Depression in Chinese Asthma Patients PLoS ONE 97 e103014, , iv Tasoa et al  Effects of depression and anxiety on antiretroviral therapy adherence among newly diagnosed HIVinfected Chinese MSM AIDS 2017, 31401406, , v Chaoyang et al Undertreatment of Mental Health Problems in Adults With Diagnosed Diabetes and Serious Psychological Distress Diabetes Care 2010 33 5, , vi Madeleine Mukeshimana, Gugu Mchunu Management of CoMorbidity of Depression and Chronic Non Communicable Diseases in Rwanda Ethiop J Health Sci 20172711726 doi, , MSF OCBA strategic plan

verdienen, , Als hulpkracht bij Lidl heb je een afwisselende baan, want wij maken van jou een echte allrounder Je vult de schappen aan met artikelen uit het magazijn Je weet precies waar alles staat, en zorgt er zo voor dat klanten nooit misgrijpen Je let erop dat de winkel schoon en opgeruimd is en helpt klanten als ze een vraag hebben Achter de kassa reken je vlot en correct af, zodat elke klant producten in ons assortiment op te nemen n door de bouw van de meest duurzame distributiecentra van Nederland Die betrokkenheid strekt zich ook uit tot onze medewerkers Lidl zorgt voor een gezonde
